name: google-voice
description: An (unofficial) native MacOS App for Google Voice.

scripts.installsupport: echo 'Run: [brew install graphicsmagick imagemagick] for additional DMG support.'
scripts.nativefier: ./node_modules/.bin/nativefier --user-agent 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; rv:74.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/74.0' --name 'Google Voice' --platform 'Mac' --width 1265 --height 1024 --flash --verbose --darwin-dark-mode-support --icon ./icon.png --internal-urls '.*(google)*.' --title-bar-style hidden --hide-window-frame --inject ui.css 'https://voice.google.com/messages' ./build
scripts.dist: npm run build && mkdir -p dist/ && ./node_modules/.bin/create-dmg './build/Google Voice-darwin-x64/Google Voice.app' --overwrite --dmg-title='Google Voice' --identity='Aubrey Portwood' ./dist/ || true && mv './dist/Google Voice 1.0.0.dmg' "./dist/Google Voice $npm_package_version.dmg"

author: Aubrey Portwood
